name: Just A sim sim REBOOT
description:
What's it about? 📋
💣 The Game is about Destruction and Wacky Experiment's! 💣

⏳ our Goal is to Deliver a fun Game that you could play for Month's and Month's without Getting bored! ⏳

it's the Wacky simulator type of Game,  and most of those Games get boring Fast!
We want to prevent that!🪐|---------------------------------------------------|

|---------------------------------------------------|
Will There be a Demo? 🎮
Yes Of course!
Altough it will Take a Bit! ⏰

Can i Apply for Play Testing? 🔨
of Course!
altough we wont Pay you Since we Have a Strict Budget!💸

Why is it a Reboot? ⛓
Our Previous Try at the Franchise went Great!
Sadly one of our Back Up System's Deleted All of our File's.. 
Meaning We Need to start from Scratch 💻

What Thing's will be Coming Back? 💾
Great Question!
🌟The Previous Try's at the Franchise had Many Fun Idea's!🌟
Most Likely to Come Back:
1: Kicking Ability, 🦿
2: Point System,📺
3: Cardboard Jetpack,📦
4: Achievement's,🧱
5: Mega Shark,🦈
6: Dance Potion,🕺🏽
7: Weirdo Potion,🍼
8: Alien abduction,🛸
Most Likely Not Coming Back:
1: Coffin Dance Reference,⚰️
2: VR Headset,🥽
3: Party Planet,🌌
4: Mega Toilet,🚽
==================================================================
Stay Tuned for More! 📡 
==================================================================
